text:
San Francisco closed indoor gyms and fitness centers for police officers and other city employees to prevent coronavirus spread, according a Wednesday letter sent to city department heads obtained by The Chronicle.

Story by @Rusty_SFChron: https://t.co/3ev1gAlToz
